description:
Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoo: Moisturising Shampoo for Dry Hair 900ml

Pantene Pro-V Daily Moisture Renewal Shampoohas 0% silicones*, 0% grease^ to help give you lightweight smooth hair. It helps to provide deep hydration from root to tip. For dry hair; Infused with Pro-V Formula, it gently cleanses to strengthen hair from the inside-out.

Recommended for : Dry, parched strands

Gives healthy looking shine & smoothness to hair

0% silicones*, 0% grease**, just lightweight smooth hair

Vitamin level tested by Swiss Vitamin Institute

*Selected variants

**Grease due to silicone
name: Pantene Pro-v Daily Moisture Renewal Nourishing Shampoo Dry Hair 900ml
